quiz.question: Add Cursor Above
quiz.note: Add a new cursor above the current line

quiz.question: Add Cursor Below
quiz.note: Add a new cursor below the current line

quiz.question: Add Cursors to Line Ends
quiz.note: Add a cursor at the end of each line in the current selection

quiz.question: Select All Occurrences of Find Match
quiz.note: Select all occurrences of the current search input

quiz.question: Save As
quiz.note: Save the current file under a new name

quiz.question: Step Over
quiz.note: Step over the current line of code

quiz.question: Step Into
quiz.note: Step into the function call on the current line of code

quiz.question: Step Out
quiz.note: Step out of the current function
